data.name: Medieval Blocks - Substance Designer Tutorial
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Table of contents: - Step by step in the creation of a tileable material of medieval blocks with Substance Designer - It shows you how to achieve the random blocks so you can use as heightmap on a chosen layout of blocks. - Explains how to achieve color, roughness, normal map and masks - Gives you an in depth view of SD nodes and mindset using procedural methods. - It's not limited to the medieval blocks, you can do a lot more learning from this video. - Mask Generators are included, as well as source files.
data.about_the_game:
Table of contents:

- Step by step in the creation of a tileable material of medieval blocks with Substance Designer
- It shows you how to achieve the random blocks so you can use as heightmap on a chosen layout of blocks.
- Explains how to achieve color, roughness, normal map and masks
- Gives you an in depth view of SD nodes and mindset using procedural methods.
- It's not limited to the medieval blocks, you can do a lot more learning from this video.
- Mask Generators are included, as well as source files.
data.short_description: Tutorial video explaining how to achieve a procedural material of medieval blocks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
